simpleDiceRoller.maxDiceCount.name: Maximum Dices in a Roll
simpleDiceRoller.maxDiceCount.hint: The highest number of dices you can throw through the Simple Dice Roller.
simpleDiceRoller.enableFateDice.name: Enable Fate Dice
simpleDiceRoller.enableFateDice.hint: If you dont know what Fate dice is you should not enable this.
